summary:
On 11/01/11, a Veteran/Employee (who is a social worker at the Nashville campus and receives treatment there as well) obtained a copy of a Sensitive Patient 
Access Report (SPAR) from the Privacy Officer (PO) for the period of 05/01/09 through 05/01/11. On 11/02/1111, the Veteran/Employee reported to the PO, upon review of the SPAR, she noted four (4) social work employees had accessed her Computerized Patient Record System (CPRS) throughout this period. The Veteran/Employee alleges these accessions were inappropriate.   The PO will conduct an investigation to determine if the accessions were appropriate

victim.victim_id: United States Department of Veterans Affairs
